segments.text: Does this bus really go to the mall ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It goes all the way there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know it does . I catch this bus a lot .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How long does it take for the bus to get there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The bus ride is only thirty minutes or so .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Where do we get off the bus ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Right behind Macy's is a bus stop .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The stop is really at the mall ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's in the middle of the parking lot .
segments.speaker: S2
